channel.title: * I could have gotten kidnapped today!
channel.description: I was walking to the supermarket late at night like I usually do, I got in there and then got my usual energy drink and then started walking home. I was almost at my street and some car pulled up beside me and someone in the car said "Excuse me" and then I said "Fuck off" and they started following me and then I like went down this alley and they drove off.

@noobie22 wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:18, topic:284533”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=375978.msg2834323#msg2834323 date=1245534511]
How did you almost ged kidnapped? They were following you, big whoop. Not like they pulled over infront of you, got a ball gag and a crow bar then smashed your window and put you in the back of their van. Then afterwards raping and beating you because being in power turns them on. Dressing you in womens clothing and high heels and making you role play for their sick sexual pleasure. Then making you put marshmellows in your mouth and do a Marlin Brando impression while sucking his dick. He did NONE of that. Why, why would you think you were almost kidnapped?
[/quote]That would be kidnapped, not almost kidnapped, retard.[/quote]

Ding Ding Ding! We have aaaaaa winnner!

item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:4, topic:284533”][quote author=lordbost link=topic=375978.msg2833203#msg2833203 date=1245488036]
I bet they just wanted to ask you for directions to somewhere.
[/quote]
So true. You were foolish to say “fuck off” to someone just because it was late at night. I guarantee you would not have said that if it was the middle of the day.[/quote]

If it was the day I doubt a car would pull up beside him and follow him.

I mean, the only time I’ve had someone pull up next to me was years back, and that was my teacher offering a lift.

Read full topic
